mapper.select: select A.iboard, A.title, A.iuser, date_format(A.regdt, '%Y-%m-%d') as regdt, A.thumbnail, B.favCnt, C.username, C.nickname, C.profileimg, C.introduction from diarydb A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT iboard, count(iboard) as favCnt FROM favdb GROUP BY iboard ) B ON A.iboard = B.iboard LEFT JOIN userdb C ON A.iuser = C.iuser WHERE C.iuser = #{iuser} AND A.title != 'preWrite' ORDER BY A.iboard desc

select A.iboard, A.title, A.iuser, date_format(A.regdt, '%Y-%m-%d') as regdt, A.thumbnail, B.favCnt, C.username, C.nickname, C.profileimg, C.introduction from diarydb A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT iboard, count(iboard) as favCnt FROM favdb GROUP BY iboard ) B ON A.iboard = B.iboard LEFT JOIN userdb C ON A.iuser = C.iuser WHERE C.iuser = #{iuser} AND A.title != 'preWrite' ORDER BY A.iboard desc LIMIT 8 OFFSET #{offsetNum}
mapper.insert: insert into diarydb (title, content, iuser) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{iuser});
mapper.select: select * from diarydb ORDER BY iboard DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert: insert into diarydb (iuser, title, content, thumbnail) values (#{iuser}, #{title}, #{content}, #{thumbnail})
mapper.delete: delete from diarydb where iboard = #{iboard} and iuser = #{iuser}
